overview.en: Clipper is a first-of-its-kind decentralized financial ecosystem that provides crypto banking, crypto asset management and crypto brokerage services. Clipper is funded by top Silicon Valley investors, operated by former Wall Street finance professionals, follows strict compliance and risk management procedures, and has the full support of Hong Kong Blockchain Association. CCC is Clipper’s platform token, and provides dividends: for every 10,000 CCC, tokenholders receive 100 USDT per year, with dividends paid out on a daily basis.
overview.zh: Clipper 数币银行是一个去中心化金融生态，为您提供支付，兑换，存贷，理财等一站式数币金融服务。 Clipper 数币银行有华尔街/硅谷投资机构背书，香港区块链协会保证，专业金融团队运营，严谨风控，安全合规。 Clipper 采用 CCC 为平台币，并发放红利：每1万CCC每年享有100USDT的红利，每天发放。
